analyze_technical_details.name: Technical Detail Analysis
analyze_technical_details.description: Generates detailed technical analysis for product specifications
analyze_technical_details.prompt_template:
Analyze these technical specifications:
{specs}

Focus areas:
{areas}

Provide a detailed technical analysis for each relevant section. For each specification:
- Explain technical significance
- Highlight performance implications
- Note industry standards
- Indicate importance level
- Provide context for values

compare_products.name: Product Comparison
compare_products.description: Identifies and analyzes key differences between products
compare_products.prompt_template:
Compare these products:
{products}

Focus areas:
{areas}

Identify and analyze key technical differences. For each difference:
- Specify the exact specification
- Compare values between products
- Explain the technical impact
- Provide recommendations
- Consider practical implications

generate_recommendations.name: Product Recommendations
generate_recommendations.description: Generates specific product recommendations based on analysis
generate_recommendations.prompt_template:
Based on:
Products: {products}
Technical Analysis: {analysis}
Key Differences: {differences}

Generate specific product recommendations. Consider:
- Use case optimization
- Technical requirements
- Performance needs
- Industry standards
- Cost-benefit trade-offs

Format each recommendation as a clear, actionable statement.
